about_the_game:
Tides of Succession is first and foremost a heart-warming romantic, slow-burn AVN. It also an intriguing setting, and has a strong narrative which you can influence through your choices.

Synopsis:

King Lovell's grip on the throne is growing weaker every passing day. His Lords are growing rebellious, and a succession ploy is expected any day. Alas, when the infamous Spice Pirate secures a Lordship through marriage, he offers his allegiance to the King. The one catch being the cunning, beautiful Princess Lorelei Lovell has to wed his appointed heir, who just happens to be you. Alas, not is all what it seems....

Branching:

Tides of Succession takes a rather severe approach to branching. Not only can you choose which Love Interest you want to pursue, you can choose who you trust, and who you want to form an allegiance with. This means your choices won't just influence the romance, but also the direction of the story.

There will be a total of 10 endings, 3 different endings for each Love Interest (there are 3 LIs), as well as a solo ending for those who desire to do so.

Love Interests:

The 3 LIs are:

  • Lorelei - The Princess and next in-line to the throne.

  • Kasula - An explorer from an enigmatic new race.

  • Glade - A dangerous, skilled pirate.

content_descriptors.notes: Tides of Succession will contain scenes depicting suggestive sexual acts and nudity as well as fantasy violence.
